extendedInfo.description: Will function for Dealer e-Process dealer and repair shop customers ONLY.Dealer e-Process allows dealers and repair shops to "visually explain" repairs with real-time photos, videos and expert diagrams. Car owners are more likely to trust and approve service recommendations when visual evidence is provided. We have been featured in the Wall Street Journal, Automotive News and Consumer Reports.Vehicle photos and videos taken with this application are instantly posted online for review by you and your customers. Relevant expert diagrams are automatically featured alongside the images.  We can also e-mail and text message the images and videos directly to your customers. We have documented a 20-40% increase in success rates on service recommendations when Dealer e-Process is used.Why has Dealer e-Process become the most popular mobile application for automotive service centers? IT REALLY INCREASES SALES Less than half of repair recommendations are approved nationally because customers do not fully understand or trust the auto repair industry. Â Showing real-time photos and videos is the best way to close sales. Â  IT SPEEDS UP CUSTOMER APPROVALS Customers can take hours or more to approve repair jobs.
